## Solution 1


```{r eval = FALSE}
plot(counties_md$geometry)
overlay	<- st_within(sesync, counties_md)
counties_sesync <- counties_md[overlay[[1]], 'geometry']
plot(counties_sesync, col = "red", add = TRUE)
plot(sesync, col = 'green', pch = 20, add = TRUE)
```
